item.title: Auto Door Closer/Locker V1.4
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

sonny bill 9, a better Antirandom would just be:

SetScreenName(Nick);
FindNormalRandoms;

Because FindLamp AND FindTalk already executed when you run FindNormalRandoms;. Plus, there’s no reason to run away from a fight, because it WILL NOT run back into the exact position it was in, which is ESSENTIAL. If dying is an issue, put all your items in the bank and add:

If FindDead then
begin
  writeLn('Player died, cannot continue.');
  TerminateScript;
end;

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Door Closer/Locker V1.4
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Hmm… true one miniute[code]{Door Locker V1.4 By Zach1188____}
{}
{Instructions: }
{1. Drag crosshairs onto RS (REQUIRED) }
{2. Find an open door, and close it once (manually). }
{3. Wait for someone to open the door again. }
{4. Place your mouse over the door. }
{5. Press ctrl+alt+r (default start shortcut), or click the green }
{ arrow. }
{ }
{This script is still in the testing stage, or beta if you must. It }
{does not have anti-randoms, so if someone could add them for me I }
{will add them to the credits. Please do not modify any other }
{part of the script. }
{ }
{Credits: }
{- Zach1188 (Creator) }
{ }
{ }
{}
{.include srl/srl.scar}
var
x2,y2,x,y,Cancel1Sec:integer;
const
Nick = ‘’;//your nick ie. 3-4 letters of username

Procedure IfDoorOpen;
begin
Cancel1Sec:=0;
repeat
wait(1)
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12895236,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,15000611,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13421577,35, 4,89, 24,35));
GetMousePos(x2,y2)
x2:=x2+1;
y2:=y2+1;
end;

Procedure CloseDoor;
begin
wait(random(5))
ClickMouse(x2,y2,true)
repeat
wait(1)
Cancel1Sec:=Cancel1Sec+1
If Cancel1Sec > 999 then IfDoorOpen
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12895236,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,15000611,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13421577,35, 4,89, 24,35)=false);
end;

Procedure AntiRandom;
begin
SetScreenName(Nick);
FindNormalRandoms;
FindTalk;
FindLamp(‘strength’);
if FindFight then
begin
Writeln(‘Found a fight so i terminated the script’);
TerminateScript;
end;
if FindFight then
begin
RunAwayDirection(‘n’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
LogOut;
TerminateScript
end;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
IfDoorOpen;
CloseDoor;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

{}
{Instructions: }
{1. Drag crosshairs onto RS (REQUIRED) }
{2. Find an open door, and close it once (manually). }
{3. Wait for someone to open the door again. }

{part of the script. }

{- Zach1188 (Creator) }

{}
{.include srl/srl.scar}
var
x2,y2,x,y,Cancel1Sec:integer;
const
Nick = ‘’;//your nick ie. 3-4 letters of username

Procedure IfDoorOpen;
begin

repeat
wait(1)
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12895236,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or

end;

Procedure CloseDoor;
begin
wait(random(5))
ClickMouse(x2,y2,true)
repeat
wait(1)
Cancel1Sec:=Cancel1Sec+1
If Cancel1Sec > 999 then IfDoorOpen
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or

FindColorTolerance(x,y,13421577,35, 4,89, 24,35)=false);
end;
Procedure AntiRandom;
begin
SetScreenName(Nick);
FindNormalRandoms;
FindTalk;
FindLamp(‘strength’);
if FindFight then
begin
Writeln(‘Found a fight so i terminated the script’);
TerminateScript;

begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
IfDoorOpen;
CloseDoor;
until(false)

item.title: Auto Door Closer/Locker V1.4
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

  1. You don’t need FindNormalRandoms; twice.
  2. FindTalk; is included with FindNormalRandoms;
  3. If it runs away from a fight, it wont run back to the exact space, which is necessary.
  4. This script is dead, the doors jam if you keep closing them.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Door Closer/Locker V1.4
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

xxlegitxx:

You got banned on a members account?

Yeah i did two
anyways here it is with antirandoms. I made it a bit more neat. [code]{Door Locker V1.4 By Zach1188____}
{}
{Instructions: }
{1. Drag crosshairs onto RS (REQUIRED) }
{2. Find an open door, and close it once (manually). }
{3. Wait for someone to open the door again. }
{4. Place your mouse over the door. }
{5. Press ctrl+alt+r (default start shortcut), or click the green }
{ arrow. }
{ }
{This script is still in the testing stage, or beta if you must. It }
{does not have anti-randoms, so if someone could add them for me I }
{will add them to the credits. Please do not modify any other }
{part of the script. }
{ }
{Credits: }
{- Zach1188 (Creator) }
{ }
{ }
{}
{.include srl/srl.scar}
var
x2,y2,x,y,Cancel1Sec:integer;
const
Nick = ‘’;//your nick ie. 3-4 letters of username

Procedure IfDoorOpen;
begin
Cancel1Sec:=0;
repeat
wait(1)
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12895236,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,15000611,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13421577,35, 4,89, 24,35));
GetMousePos(x2,y2)
x2:=x2+1;
y2:=y2+1;
end;

Procedure CloseDoor;
begin
wait(random(5))
ClickMouse(x2,y2,true)
repeat
wait(1)
Cancel1Sec:=Cancel1Sec+1
If Cancel1Sec > 999 then IfDoorOpen
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,12895236,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,15000611,35, 4,89, 24,35) or
FindColorTolerance(x,y,13421577,35, 4,89, 24,35)=false);
end;
Procedure AntiRandom;
begin
SetScreenName(Nick);
FindNormalRandoms;
FindTalk;
FindNormalRandoms;
FindLamp(‘strength’);
if FindFight then
begin
RunAwayDirection(‘S’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
RunBack;
end;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
IfDoorOpen;
CloseDoor;
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: Auto Door Closer/Locker V1.4
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

I added anti randoms for you. It is easy, lol. When using SRL.

[code]{Door Locker V1.4 By Zach1188____}
{}
{Setup: }
{- SRL 3.81 or above. }
{- SCAR 2.03 or above. }
{- A web browser or Runescape client }
{ }
{Instructions: }
{1. Drag crosshairs onto RS (REQUIRED) }
{2. Find an open door, and close it once (manually). }
{3. Wait for someone to open the door again. }
{4. Place your mouse over the door. }
{5. Press ctrl+alt+r (default start shortcut), or click the green }
{ arrow. }
{ }
{Thanks to IP-Drowner. I now have Anti-Randoms so people would get }
{ get less banned. He still believes that this script can get }
{ people banned more often }
{Credits: }
{- Zach1188 (Creator) }
{- Dudeofthed (Anti Randoms adder) }
{ }
{}
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const
LampSkill = smithing; //If a genie appears, which skill would you like it to raise?

var
x2,y2,x,y,Cancel1Sec:integer;

Procedure IfDoorOpen;
begin
Cancel1Sec:=0;
repeat
wait(1)
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,12895236,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,15000611,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,13421577,35, 4,89, 24,35));

GetMousePos(x2,y2)
x2:=x2+1;
y2:=y2+1;
end;

procedure AntiRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindForester;
FindMaze;
FindMime;
FindLamp(LampSkill);
FindScapeRune;
SolveTalkingRandom;
end;

Procedure CloseDoor;
begin
wait(1000 + Random(769))
Mouse(x2,y2,True);
repeat
wait(1)
Cancel1Sec:=Cancel1Sec+1
If Cancel1Sec > 999 then IfDoorOpen
Until(FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292049,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,12961540,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,12895236,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,13292050,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,15000611,35, 4,89, 24,35) or FindColorTolerance(x,y,13421577,35, 4,89, 24,35)=false);
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
AntiRandoms;
IfDoorOpen;
AntiRandoms;
CloseDoor;
AntiRandoms;
until(false)
end.[/code]

If it finds a Freaky Forestor, it will: LogOut.
If it finds a fight, it will: Do nothing.
If it finds a mime, it will: Solve it.
If it finds a lamp, it will: Choose the skill you want it to choose.
If it finds ScapeRune, it will: Solve it.
If it finds a maze, it will: Solve it.
If it finds a box, it will: Solve it.
If it finds a Talking Random, it will: Talk to it and do whatever (i.e Sandwich Lady).

Read full topic
